hero.title: Connecting Dreams with Destinations
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner in travel, education, and international trade since our founding. We bridge cultures and create opportunities across Central Asia and the Gulf region.

owner.title: Meet Our Founder
owner.name: Dr. White
owner.biography: With over two decades of experience in international business and education, Dr. White founded our company with a vision to connect Central Asia with global opportunities. His expertise in cross-cultural communication and deep understanding of regional markets has made Dr White Group a trusted name in travel, education, and trade services.
owner.vision: To create bridges between cultures and provide exceptional service that transforms dreams into reality.

founding.description: Dr White Group was established with a mission to provide comprehensive travel, education, and trade services connecting Central Asia with the world.

growth.title: Expanding Horizons
growth.description: From our headquarters in Bishkek, we've grown to serve clients across multiple countries, establishing partnerships and networks that span continents.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide exceptional, personalized services that help individuals and businesses achieve their international goals while maintaining the highest standards of integrity and professionalism.

main.title: Main Office
main.description: Our headquarters in the heart of Central Asia, strategically positioned to serve the region's growing international needs.

global.title: Worldwide Reach
global.description: With branches and trusted agents worldwide, we provide seamless service across continents.

guarantees.title: Enhanced Service Guarantees
guarantees.subtitle: Our comprehensive commitment to delivering exceptional and reliable services

items.title: Absolute Quality Assurance
items.description: We guarantee the highest quality standards in all our services with meticulous attention to detail, from visa processing to educational placements and business services.

items.title: Complete Pricing Transparency
items.description: Full commitment to no hidden fees or financial surprises. All costs are clearly defined from the beginning with comprehensive breakdown of every service.

items.title: Strict Deadline Adherence
items.description: We respect your time and commit to agreed deadlines with precise tracking systems to ensure all services are delivered on schedule.

items.title: Specialized Personal Support
items.description: Dedicated team for each client providing personalized consultations and continuous support tailored specifically to your individual needs and circumstances.

items.title: Goal Achievement Guarantee
items.description: Strong commitment to your success with alternative plans and continuous follow-up to ensure achievement of your goals in travel, education, or business ventures.

items.title: Lifetime Ongoing Support
items.description: Long-term relationship extending beyond initial service delivery, with continuous support and free consultations to ensure your continued success.

items.title: Security and Privacy Guarantee
items.description: Complete protection of your personal and financial data with highest digital security standards and total confidentiality in all transactions.

items.title: Rapid Response Guarantee
items.description: Commitment to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours maximum, with 24/7 support team available for urgent cases.

disclaimer.title: Important Notice - Disclaimer
disclaimer.subtitle: Important information about official dealings with Dr White Group

warning.title: Important Warning
warning.text: Dr White Group deals exclusively through official channels mentioned on this website only.

official_channels.title: Authorized Official Channels
items: Main Office: Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan, Oktyabrsky District, Maxim Gorky Street 21
Phone numbers listed in the contact section of the website
Official email addresses listed on the website
Official social media accounts linked to the website

non_responsibility.title: Non-Responsibility
items: We bear no responsibility for dealings with any persons or entities not officially mentioned on this website
We are not responsible for any services or promises made by unauthorized intermediaries
We do not guarantee the accuracy or legitimacy of any information provided by unofficial external sources
We bear no responsibility for any financial or legal damages resulting from dealings with unauthorized parties

verification.title: Identity Verification
verification.text: To ensure you are dealing with our official representatives, please contact us directly through the channels mentioned above to verify the identity of anyone claiming to represent the company.

legal_action.title: Legal Action
legal_action.text: We will take necessary legal action against any person or entity using the company name illegally or providing services in our name without official authorization.

success.title: Student Success Stories
success.subtitle: Real stories from students who achieved their dreams with our guidance

stories.name: Aida K.
stories.quote: Dr White Group made my dream of studying medicine abroad a reality. Their support was invaluable throughout the entire process.

stories.name: Omar S.
stories.quote: Professional service and genuine care. They guided me every step of the way to my engineering program in Dubai.

stories.name: Fatima A.
stories.quote: Excellent support from application to arrival. Now I'm pursuing my MBA in Doha thanks to their expertise.

items.title: Integrity
items.description: We conduct business with the highest ethical standards and transparency.

items.title: Excellence
items.description: We strive for excellence in every service we provide, exceeding expectations.

items.title: Cultural Sensitivity
items.description: We respect and celebrate the diverse cultures we serve, bridging differences with understanding.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We continuously improve our services using the latest technology and best practices.
